name: Keep It Reel
description: A distraction free way to save recipes from Instagram instagram and youtube in a strucutred format to Notion. No App install needed.

name: Mahabharata Notes
description: A knowledge graph of Bibek Debroy's Unabridged Mahabharata with interconnected notes on stories, characters, and places.

name: Photon - Add Caption to Photos
description: A lightweight iOS app to add captions to photos. Makes photos searchable. Encodes text captions in the image metadata so that photos don't lose caption even when shared.
